Talk_0004:
You must be Link!


You're as foolish as you are greedy. Who
would've left precious bananas just lying
around? You walked right into our trap!
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, right.<sp:5:0:0> Introductions. Ahem.


Listen and tremble in horror!<sp:5:1:0> Watch and
quake with fear!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>For we are the unstoppable force sworn to
eliminate you and Princess Zelda too!<sp:5:1:0>
Led by the indomitable MASTER KOHGA!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0005:
<snd:TalkDeny_00>And now...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>You're about to pay the price for your
foolishness. Let me introduce you to our
debt collector.
Born of the Depths, lurking in the
darkness of the Forest Coliseum...
